seo: D-Link,敏感信息泄露,CVE-2024-3274,MAC地址泄露,固件升级
seo_en: D-Link,sensitive information leak,CVE-2024-3274,MAC address leak,firmware upgrade
summary: 该插件用于检测D-Link设备是否存在通过特定请求获取设备MAC地址等敏感信息的漏洞，并提供相应的解决方案。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether D-Link devices have the vulnerability of obtaining sensitive information such as device MAC address through specific requests, and provides corresponding solutions.
